text: In the attached PPT, when converted to image, The text does not come. Only the table and bullets appear.

The mentioned attachment is not available and there was no update on this bug for a very long time, therefore I am resolving this. Please try with an up-to-date version of POI and reopen the bug if it is still does not work for you.
